item.title: Next-Gen system container management
item.description: The why? So, lately i’ve been deeply involved with *nix’s namespaces and cgrpups. I am trying to build ths tool called: tent, which basically at high level is a chroot clone but with modern flare. So it has some automatic mounting points, user directora manupilations etc… Along the way, i got to learn quite a lot how linux handles containers, especially with liblxc. The way i was going with it was by trying to understand how Canonical’s lxd (lxc) works.
